scripts.test: run-s db:clean db:cleanauth db:run test:runfull db:clean test:runfull-authonly db:cleanauth
scripts.test:runfull-authonly: run-s db:run-auth-basic test:runfull-authonly-basic db:clean db:run-auth-token test:runfull-authonly-token db:clean db:run-auth-xtoken test:runfull-authonly-xtoken db:clean
scripts.test:update: run-s db:clean db:run && jest --runInBand --updateSnapshot && run-s db:clean
scripts.db:run: cd ../.. && CHROMA_PORT=8001 docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml up --detach && sleep 5
scripts.db:run-auth-basic:
cd ../.. && docker run --rm --entrypoint htpasswd httpd:2 -Bbn admin admin > server.htpasswd && echo "CHROMA_SERVER_AUTHN_CREDENTIALS_FILE=/chroma/server.htpasswd

CHROMA_SERVER_AUTHN_PROVIDER=chromadb.auth.basic_authn.BasicAuthenticationServerProvider
CHROMA_PORT=8001" > .chroma_env && docker-compose -f docker-compose.test-auth.yml --env-file ./.chroma_env up --detach && sleep 5
scripts.db:run-auth-token: cd ../.. && echo "CHROMA_SERVER_AUTHN_CREDENTIALS=test-token\nCHROMA_SERVER_AUTHN_PROVIDER=chromadb.auth.token_authn.TokenAuthenticationServerProvider\nCHROMA_PORT=8001" > .chroma_env && docker-compose -f docker-compose.test-auth.yml --env-file ./.chroma_env up --detach && sleep 5
scripts.db:run-auth-xtoken:
cd ../.. && echo "CHROMA_AUTH_TOKEN_TRANSPORT_HEADER=X_CHROMA_TOKEN
CHROMA_SERVER_AUTHN_CREDENTIALS=test-token
CHROMA_SERVER_AUTHN_PROVIDER=chromadb.auth.token_authn.TokenAuthenticationServerProvider
CHROMA_PORT=8001" > .chroma_env && docker-compose -f docker-compose.test-auth.yml --env-file ./.chroma_env up --detach && sleep 5
scripts.release_alpha: run-s build test:run && npm publish --tag alpha
scripts.release_dev: run-s build test:run && npm version ${NEW_VERSION} --no-git-tag-version && npm publish
